title: Setup
content:
Packages

```
sudo apt upgrade -y && sudo apt install xbindkeys curl
```
```
sudo apt install vlc guake gimp smartmontools mplayer indicator-cpufreq caffeine xautomation build-essential adb git gparted unrar zip unzip p7zip-full p7zip-rar rar telegram-desktop gedit android-tools-adb android-tools-fastboot gnome-tweak-tool ubuntu-restricted-extras snapd usb-creator-gtk openjdk-8-jdk -y
```

<hr>

Codium

```
wget -qO - https://gitlab.com/paulcarroty/vscodium-deb-rpm-repo/-/raw/master/pub.gpg | gpg --dearmor | sudo dd of=/etc/apt/trusted.gpg.d/vscodium.gpg 

echo 'deb https://paulcarroty.gitlab.io/vscodium-deb-rpm-repo/debs/ vscodium main' | sudo tee --append /etc/apt/sources.list.d/vscodium.list 

sudo apt install codium
```

Trim Storage

```
sudo fstrim -v /
```
<hr>
Disable Swap

```
sudo gedit /etc/sysctl.conf 
```
`vm.swappiness=1`
<hr>


xbindkeys


```
gedit ~/.xbindkeysrc
```
```
# Copy / Cut with ctrl-c / ctrl-x
"~/Public/Apps/bind_copy.sh"
    b:8

# Paste with ctrl-v
"~/Public/Apps/bind_paste.sh"
    b:9 + Release

"xte 'keydown Alt_L' 'key Tab' 'keyup Alt_L'"
    b:6

"xte 'key Super_L'"
    b:6

```

```
killall -HUP xbindkeys
xbindkeys
``` 

copy
```
#! /bin/bash

t=$( cat ~/.t.txt );

if [ $t = 2 ]; then
    hdparm -Y /dev/sda;
fi;

if [ $t = 1 ]; then
    xte 'keydown Control_L' 'key x' 'keyup Control_L';
else
    xte 'keydown Control_L' 'key c' 'keyup Control_L';
fi;

t=$(( t+1 ));
echo $t > ~/.t.txt;
sleep .5;
echo 0 > ~/.t.txt;
```

paste
```
#! /bin/bash

u=$(cat ~/.u.txt);
if [ $u = 1 ]; then 
    xte 'keydown Control_L' 'key z' 'keyup Control_L' 
    xte 'key Super_L';
else
    xte 'keydown Control_L' 'key v' 'keyup Control_L'; 
fi;
u=$((u+1));
echo $u > ~/.u.txt;
sleep 0.3;
echo 0 > ~/.u.txt
```
<hr>

NodeJs
```
curl -o- https://raw.githubusercontent.com/nvm-sh/nvm/v0.35.3/install.sh | bash
```
```
nvm install node
npm install -g nativescript
sudo update-alternatives --config java
```
```
nvm ls
nvm alias default xxxxxx
```
<hr>

Alias
```
gedit .bashrc
```

```
# .. NVM
export NVM_DIR="$HOME/.nvm"
[ -s "$NVM_DIR/nvm.sh" ] && \. "$NVM_DIR/nvm.sh"
[ -s "$NVM_DIR/bash_completion" ] && \. "$NVM_DIR/bash_completion"

# .. Androud SDK
export ANDROID_HOME=/home/$USER/Public/Android/sdk-tools-linux
export ANDROID_SDK_ROOT=$ANDROID_HOME
export PATH=$PATH:$ANDROID_SDK_ROOT/tools/bin
export PATH=$PATH:$ANDROID_HOME/tools:$ANDROID_HOME/platforms-tools
alias emulator="sh $ANDROID_HOME/tools/emulator"

# .. Tor
alias d="gsettings set org.gnome.system.proxy.socks host '' && gsettings set org.gnome.system.proxy.socks port 0"
alias s="gsettings set org.gnome.system.proxy.socks host 'localhost' && gsettings set org.gnome.system.proxy.socks port 9050"
alias r="sudo systemctl reload tor"
alias i="curl http://icanhazip.com/ && torsocks curl http://icanhazip.com/"

# .. NS
alias cc="codium ~/Documents/Dora/ && codium ~/Documents/DoraServer/"
alias 1='read -p "Hi, Project: " project && read -sp "ok, passKEY: " key && echo "" && echo "ok, ..." && cd ~/Documents/$project/ && tns build android --release --key-store-path fitored.keystore --key-store-password $key --key-store-alias "fitored" --key-store-alias-password $key && nautilus ~/Documents/$project/platforms/android/app/build/outputs/apk/release/ && key="wiped" && echo "OK, passKey $key :)" && echo "Bye."'
alias 3='cd ~/Documents/Moshaf/ && ns run android --no-hmr'
alias 5='cd ~/Documents/Moshaf/ && ns run android --clean --no-hmr'
alias 7='cd ~/Documents/Moshaf/ && ns debug android --no-hmr'

# .. Lunchers
alias n="Public/Apps/boost-note-linux.AppImage"

# .. Audio Resetter
alias re-audio="pactl set-default-sink alsa_output.pci-0000_00_1f.3.analog-stereo"
#alias f="cd ~/Documents/Fitored/ && codium . && npm run serve"
#alias l1="cd ~/Documents/Fitored/src/ && tsc ./js/*.ts --watch"
#alias l2="cd ~/Documents/Fitored/src/ && browser-sync start --server -w"
#alias o="system76-power profile battery"
#alias p="system76-power profile performance"
```
